name: 2Giant2Robo
description:
I had a dream recently.
It was a vivid dream, likely due to the strain my brain has been under lately, trying its hardest to maintain composure amidst waves of THC and income-related stress.
In this dream, I was a woman standing atop the shoulder of a massive robot man who towered above a tiny planet which struggled to contain so much as his feet.
We spoke at length about his experience slowly falling apart while watching the universe from afar.
I felt the sun rise and set upon his tiny world many times within this one brief conversation.

Remembering the imagery vividly upon waking up, I rushed to illustrate the dream as quickly as possible.

This illustration served as the basis for 2G2R, a silly little Visual Novel game set within the context of that single conversation between man and machine.
I hope you will enjoy it.
